abstract: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development says European debt crisis is harming economic growth in Eastern Europe. and will cut its 2012 growth forecast for the region in half, to 1.7 percent.
snippet: The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development cut its growth estimate for Central Europe and the Baltics to 1.7 percent for 2012.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development

lead_paragraph: The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development cut its growth estimate for Central Europe and the Baltics to 1.7 percent for 2012.

headline.main: Euro Crisis Weighing On East European Growth
headline.print_headline: Bank Says East Europe Will Grow More Slowly
headline.seo: Debt Crisis to Cut Growth in Eastern Europe, Report Says
